description:

I think because they clicked on and off set, Stone was more willing to try things, and his dick has never been more solid. He just had an easy time, and maaaaybe he liked working with Jet. And Jet, as usual, doesn't seem to get fully aroused until he is getting fucked. It's official! He is a bottom!

This is one hot video with two Elite performers!
title: Jet & Stone - RAW
